sentences.sContent: The girls come from a variety of different backgrounds.
sentences.sCn: 这些女孩出身背景各不相同。

sentences.sContent: ...the government has taken a variety of measures to prevent the disaster...
...There are many natural beauties everywhere and many national minorities provide tourists with variety of colorful cultural experience...
...There are a variety of delicious foods for you to choose...
...Meals must contain a variety of foods with plenty of grains and at least one fruit or vegetable each day...
...we put up a display with a variety of job resources that we restocked every hour...
...and knowing how to do research are all solid background skills for a wide variety of roles...
...high schools for a variety of reasons seemed to have made little progress...
...It offers a variety of lessons and activities for students to choose from...
...online customers have access to commodities of such a huge variety and number...
...21st century has brought with it an unprecedented variety of recreational activities ranging from traditional outdoor activities such as playing ball games to all kinds of online ones...
...This allows advertisers more variety in the types of messages they create because they...

phrases.pCn: 货品种类，产品种类；产品多样化；积簇

words.tran: 多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
使多样化，使丰富多彩；使成杂色

trans.tranOther: a lot of things of the same type that are different from each other in some way
